game_description: Control Room (by QuarkXR) is a FREE app which allows you to work on any project in VR by connecting to your computer wirelessly. • Powered by QuarkXR's Unity SDK! • Multiple virtual environments with plenty more on the way! • Move freely in all scenes, reposition the screen, or adjust the curve and distance. • The screen is rendered on a separate timewarp layer for great readability. Control Room Pro and Enterprise editions are coming soon with the following features: • Multiplayer support to enable team collaboration in VR! • Multiple screen support to enable better productivity! • Ability to add custom Unity scenes. Work in your dream virtual environment! • Chat with people outside of VR via a simple web link! • And much more! Download the Server app, and read more at www.quarkxr.com/control-room.
review_1: Can you play roblox vr fully with 360* with / without cables? On Microsoft 10/11?
review_2: No easy access to getting the server up for the PC on their website no instead it sends you to GitHub And you would have to dig through to find the right file that would allow you to install the server side of it not worth the headache at this point
review_5: I was having trouble getting the desktop app to work so I sent a message on the Discord channel. They were very quick to respond and helped get the application working. Everything works great now!
